section.intro.name: Hinny Tsang
section.intro.headline: Data Scientist / Quant / Developer
section.intro.summary: I enjoy turning messy data into useful things - whether that's a trading signal, an internal tool, or a pipeline that just works. Background in physics, currently exploring the intersection of data science and quantitative finance.
